system.description: As a downtime action you train each of your allies to better use their guns. Give each ally a Bullet die appropriate to your Tier (Tier 1: d4, Tier 2: d6, Tier 3: d8, Tier 4:d10). They may roll this Bullet die whenever they make an attack with a gun and add the result to their attack roll.
